report_setup.c File Reference

Routines to set up the report tools. More...

#include "report.h"
#include "log.h"
#include "strtools.h"
#include <stdlib.h>

Detailed Description

Routines to set up the report tools.

These functions create lists to be used when the individual report tools are first brought up, creating the lists of variable names to be used for the tools' list items.

Note:Each of the get_xxx_varnames functions dynamically allocate memory *once* and never free it as long as the program is active.
